website_summaries.verdict: One of the least expensive meal replacement powders available. Aimed at helping with weight loss.
pros: Powder contains 24 minerals and vitamins to help replace what you're missing from a meal
Powder works when mixed with liquid or when used in some recipes
Has a simple taste that many people like
cons: Has only 10 grams of protein per serving, so it may not curb your hunger fully

customer_reviews.title: So far Taste Is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Ill update my comment in 2 weeks! I bought the 34 serving one to try it out twice a day for 2 weeks! Actually 17 days. But I will keep you all posted. SO FAR IT TASTES AMAZING, Literally it tastes like a milkshake. I am So Shook!! Especially with Ice!!!! I use it with 1% milk and I would like to try it with almond milk and soy milk. As of hunger, it does curve my hunger. UPDATE: I HAVE LOST 8lbs on slimfast!! I will update in the next few months because I will continue to use this!!! In love!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best shake ever!!!! I have had lots of brands the most expensive "best quality" shakes. This is by far the best ever!! Drink it with some sugar free vanilla almond milk and it tastes just like one of those fudge popsicles! I'm not kidding...just like it!! I could think 1000000 of them lol and for only 110cal "200" with the almond milk you can beat it. No one offered me a free shake or money off I'm honestly giving you my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Astan413

customer_reviews.title: Great taste.
customer_reviews.text: Helped me lose 50 pounds in 5 months. Great taste.
customer_reviews.author: sdKeith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It tastes great and really works. I have been having a shake and a banana for breakfast everyday and eating healthy the rest of the time and in one month I've lost 13 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, I love eat sweet food in the morning and this is the best product ! I’m hungry 4 hours after the first shake! I took one in the morning and one at the evening and for my lunch I ate vegetables, chicken, rice or potatoes! I lost 13 pounds in 3 weeks with slim fast and Forskolin ! I recommend you!
customer_reviews.author: Maira

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I'm one canister in now and have been drinking 1-2 shakes a day (more often 1) as meal substitues. I was previously a frequent snacker but sticking to the regimen recommended on the package, I have finally started losing weight!! I've tried dramatic workout regimens but hadn't found a diet one that I could maintain and that showed results until this. I've lost a few pounds so far, nothing too crazy, but for how long I've been working at this I will definitely keep drinking these shakes. I recommend them blended with milk ice and water or with almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Open product
customer_reviews.text: The can was open when arrived here all the powder fell in the box.
customer_reviews.author: iap

customer_reviews.title: Old School
customer_reviews.text: I need to lose about 45 lbs. before my cruise in Aug. 2020. I already bought an exercise bike and now I got my meal replacement drink. Slim Fast! Strawberries and Cream is my favorite. I need to look and see if they carry Ultra Slim Fast. Since Friday, I've lost 3 lbs. I'm writing this on the following Wednesday. I'm pleased with my progress so far and can't wait for my cruise. Well on my way to being healthier!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: The taste is fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I've been a SF-for-breakfast every day since 2015. My local grocery stopped carrying the chocolate and I found a much better deal on Amazon and have been purchasing two cans at a time. While it's not quite 34 servings, (perhaps it depends on how rounded you make the one scoopful), I am absolutely satisfied. I don't even look for it at the grocery any more. Tip: it's yummy with a small banana and a handful of greens blended in--really accentuates the nutritional value--and don't forget a tsp. of cinnamon!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Adams

customer_reviews.title: lost 53lbs on this
customer_reviews.text: I have lost 53 lbs on this product, great tasting, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lori Glover

customer_reviews.title: Why is there so much sugar?
customer_reviews.text: it was the milk that provides most of the protein. Sugar and it substitutes are listed in the print on ingredients. So why should I buy more of this fraudulent weight loss product?
customer_reviews.author: A colonial historian

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a supplement since I don't tend to eat breakfast, which means by lunch, I'm usually starving and want to eat everything in sight. I just made my first shake with lactose-free milk in a blender bottle, and it was very tasty! I bought the strawberry one, and it honestly tastes like the strawberry shake from McDonald's! My only critique is that the canister is so small, and I don't think it contains a full 30 servings (but we'll see). Also, I could kind of feel the powder as I drank it (but that may have been my own fault for not mixing well?). Overall, looking forward to having this every morning!
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it suppose to !!! Suppress my hunger for Hours !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this !! With proper diet and no exercise And this shake for breakfast once a day with a piece of fruit , i honestly lost 30 pounds in like 3 months or less maybe i ain’t really time but didn’t take too long .. i would show before and after But no upload pic option. Love it and specially for price , flavor is awesome :)
customer_reviews.author: Rakia McCaffity

customer_reviews.title: Mystery?
customer_reviews.text: Is this a new formula? It tastes completely different 🤔. I don’t understand. I’ve been drinking slim fast for so many years and I couldn’t get enough of it. It used to taste so good. This one tastes like I’m drinking a cup of sugar. Tried looking it up on the internet to see if they changed the formula but couldn’t find anything.
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Holy sugar batman
customer_reviews.text: When you open the lid the powder shimmers.... that's how much sugar is in this. It tastes like a liquefied cupcake. Its so sweet I couldn't finish it much less see myself losing weight on it. Might as well buy the cake mix and snort lines. I bet you'd lose weight faster.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Turley

customer_reviews.title: Follow it and do what it tells you to do and it will work
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for 1 month and lost 20 lbs so far. I do a shake in the morning then habe fruit for a snack. Shake for lunch and more fruit for snack. And then a high protein low carb dinner. And if I wish, another fruit for desert.
customer_reviews.author: Veridiana mireles

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just like I remember. Tastes like a frosty. Have lost 8 pounds in 3 weeks. I have one for breakfast and dinner. I eat a good meal for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Keb300

customer_reviews.title: It’s not like it use to be - weak chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.text: This shipment is not like any other shipment. The product is a very light color instead of the rich chocolate color and the flavor is very weak chocolate and very sweet. Both containers have very light colored contents. I have attached a picture if the regular product (right side) and the one I just got (Left side) They also changed the label. I do not like the new product.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond R.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed because this is my go to drink in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this for years, and I bought 3 more of these and the last batch is much grainier and the texture of the powder is different. Enough so that my daughter thought I'd switched flavors of chocolate so I had to go back through my orders to see if it was the same one I've ordered for years and it was. Disappointed because this is my go to drink in the morning or I use it after workouts.
customer_reviews.author: phatdaddy

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR THE LACTOSE INTOLERANT
customer_reviews.text: If, like me, you are lactose intolerant but not careful about reading labels, TAKE HEED! This product is NOT good for anyone with lactose intolerance. I tried one shake, using almond milk. Initially, I was very pleased with how filling and tasty it turned out to be. HOWEVER - shortly after ingesting, I realized something was severely wrong. Turns out the protein is derived from dairy, and my body reacted as if I was poisoned. **The one star is purely for those with lactose intolerance. I can imagine that for those with the enzymes to digest dairy, this is probably a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: NO LONGER GLUTEN FREE
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was getting this because I need a gluten free mix. BE CAREFUL. The last one I received must be a revised formula and the gluten free claim on the front is gone. It also claims that it may contain gluten. Unfortunate... the price was great and the product tasted nice before it was changed. The sellers need to update the product pictures so that those with serious allergies don't get this and consume it without double checking the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Pinkleton

customer_reviews.title: Great meal alternative!
customer_reviews.text: Does this help you loose weight? The answer is yes and no. This powder does make you feel full for about 2-3 hours. It's great for those busy mornings and late dinners. However, this product alone will not help you lose weight. You also have to include excerise everyday to really see the results kick in. Also, mixing the powder with milk instead of water makes it taste wayyyy better. Lastly, avoid the vanilla flavor, it tastes awful. Stick to the chocolate flavors. If you mix the chocolate flavor with milk, it literally takes like a regular choclate shake.
customer_reviews.author: basick

customer_reviews.title: Great for mornings!
customer_reviews.text: Nice large container. I remember them being much smaller years ago. Same great taste though. I have a smoothie every morning with a 1/2 cup frozen berries and 1 cup light vanilla soy milk. Delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Chelisamarie

customer_reviews.title: YUM!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I’m trying to lose weight, so I’ve been having shake for breakfast each morning. I’ve cut out my sweets and this has definitely help replace my chocolate fix each morning! I mix with unsweetened vanilla almond milk and it tastes very good! I usually freeze for about 25 minutes because I find it tastes better cold. Keeps me full for a few hours, I’ve also shed a few pounds. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the cost. I guess "buyer beware" applies here. There are 30g of cabs and 10g of protein!! Seriously!?! And that is with the milk. Without milk there is only 2g of protein to 18g of carbs. The first ingredient listed is sugar!!! Yes, sugar!! Also it says gluten free and then warns there may be wheat in it. Since it will cost me more money to return it I will put it in the pantry and eventually it will make its way into the garbage! BTW this WAS one of the choices when I searched for protein shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Fadziewicz

customer_reviews.title: still the best protein drink.
customer_reviews.text: still the best for a delicious protein drink. I use it to supplemen or sub for a missed meal not for weight loss although it would be great for that as a controlled diabetic who doesn't eat enough protein but who is not on meds. I cannot tolerate any artificial sweeteners or stevia etc so this is good .I use fat free milk 8 oz, add 1/2 cup or so ice and blend in my Ninja. sometimes I add banana slices from fridge instead of ice. excellent.
customer_reviews.author: honey

customer_reviews.title: Small pebbles = Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I ordered this product. The first time, it was great! This second time, not so good. A lot of the powder isn’t dissolving in the liquid. I can shake and shake for minutes, but it doesn’t help. There are always small hard pieces left in the drink. You have bite down on all the hard rock like pieces in order to drink it. And at the end of your drink, there are tiny pebble like pieces left over. Not very satisfying. It’s not past the expiration dat, so maybe this is just a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy course powder...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered several times from this company but this is the first time the product didn’t look or taste right. It wasn’t a smooth powder like before but rather course powder with lots of lumps and a different flavor.( I’ve been using slim fast for 8 yrs, I know what it should look like).. I opened all six cans and each one was like that. Wonder if they are an old product or had gotten damp or something.. will need to look for a new vendor 😩
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please make this formula get more sticking power!
customer_reviews.text: Slim Fast is an old standby for a nutritional supplement for me, but I really wish they would update the original formula. It's not filling at all unless you mix it with whole or 2% milk, which kind of defeats the purpose. That being said, it's a good quick resolution when I run out of my usual supplement powder, and it blends well with both soy and almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: J McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought dieting could be this delicious. I actually look forward to drinking my Slimfast every day. Ive already lost 10lbs in just a couple weeks!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan K.

customer_reviews.title: Slim fast
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It has a lot of Protein in it. I been watching my carbs and this definitely keeps it under 65 at the end of day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Weird color and too much sugar!
customer_reviews.text: When I finished my last container of SlimFast, I was glad I had another one ready to go. When I opened it, I noticed that the powder was much lighter than the previous SlimFast container I had. I decided to try it, and it tastes like there is so much sugar and more salt in it. I’m not sure if I got a bad batch or what, but I can’t drink anymore SlimFast shakes from that container. I even tried it out on a few separate occasions to make sure I wasn’t being crazy. This is going straight in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Taste great even if you just use the instructions. Thank me later, for the first picture, best combo ever!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: Ok I have to be honest guys this is the best slim protein I ever had....it dont get me sick...it taste so good....no bad after taste and it helps me lose weight......but guys u have to work out and skip meals.....💪💪💪💪but I love this product and I'm sticking to it 2020 sexy Body here I come💃💃💃💃
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.LaRonde & Mr.LaRonde

customer_reviews.title: Big guy losing weight
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3" 286 pounds when I started with this as a meal replacement for breakfast. I also have a smaller drink at night if I'm craving desert after dinner. I have lost 17 pounds after two months without changing the rest of the foods I eat. One drink in the morning will give me enough energy to last till lunch, were as before I had to eat a few hours after breakfast. It has really worked for me but I really like the taste which helps.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wilson

customer_reviews.title: No No No
customer_reviews.text: Lead to more sugar cravings. I cut out carbs and I started eating protein and veggies. Amen.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: No scoop. Caused bowl movements with minutes .
customer_reviews.text: No scoop . Excellent taste and consistency if our in blender with milk and ice. Careful not to add to much because it can be really sweet. Not sure if I drink too much since there was no scooper but not even 20 minutes later I had diarrhea all day. Guess that could help you lose weight. I don’t like that it has aspartame and sugar in it. Why both. Sugar is the first ingredient. I only used for one day so far but I will keep using and see if it makes me not hungry all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Losing weight and loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I've got these two 31 oz cans on subscription. I love the rich texture and fullness that I get with these. I mix it in my NutriBullet because I like to add some fresh ginger and either a half banana or some carrots. I've tried it with crushed ice and water and with crushed ice and non-fat dry milk. I like it better with the milk. My only wish is that they offered the vanilla and strawberry in this size. I'd like to have more variety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I gave this a good review because the taste if great
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a good review because the taste if great. Its really very chocolaty - just be sure to blend it well, and in an actual blender, for at least 30 seconds solid. Also, I mix it with water and it is still very rich if you use six to eight ounces of water. The price is okay, but the delivery to the door can't be beat. I don't like being seen in the store buying diet products because I'm vain I guess. I loose weight fast on this one because the protein in the morning really gives my metabolism a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: KMart closed so I have to go online to get what I want.
customer_reviews.text: KMart closed. I used to buy this flavor there. Nobody else carries it. I can get the chocolate flavors, but not this one. I hate the jerk that closed KMart so he could put more money in his pocket. I have to buy it on line. The quality was fine. I will probably buy it here again, since on line is the only place I can get it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Beamon

customer_reviews.title: Good for resetting appetite. Long term use will cause weight gain
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE READ I have mixed feelings about slim fast. If you’re trying to loose weight I will mention you should use for only a couple days to cut your appetite if eating is the source of your weight gain. This method is helpful. My boyfriend is extremely fit. We recently purchased the FITINDEX scale (also on amazon) Weighing ourselves everyday and seeing how the things we consume effect our bodies. He gains 3 pounds every day from consuming slim fast. He uses it for protein and packing on pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I don't have time to sit down for a full meal and have a tendency to go into a food coma. This i a great, quick energy booster and delivers a great nutrition profile and doesn't weight me down in the middle of the day when I don't want to sit down or take a nap. It tastes great and mixes well with other protein powders (strawberry, matcha, peanut butter, etc) when I want an extra protein boost for a workout. Great value. I can't find this price locally.
customer_reviews.author: Natalee N

customer_reviews.title: Bad side effects
customer_reviews.text: I really, really wanted to write a good review because slim fast is so yummy but it was a really bad experience. I did slim fast for almost 2 months as a meal replacement for breakfast and lunch. It gave me such horrible diarrhea twice a day, I’m talking mud butt, in the bathroom for 20 plus minutes. On top of that I started to develop bad headaches every day, the advice was to drink more water but I drink A LOT of water. As soon as I decided to give up on Slim-fast the headaches and bathroom issues subsided. Really disappointed that it didn’t work out.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser733

customer_reviews.title: An exception to the rule about QUANTITY control
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years & have had this on auto refill for some time. When I opened this latest canister, it looked like it was missing about 20% of its content,
customer_reviews.author: steve m

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Royale has changed if you see a straw in the glass beware
customer_reviews.text: LOOK FOR THE STRAW IN THE GLASS ON THE CAN NEW VERSION IS AWFUL!!! I dislike that they've changed the ingredients and the powder is ground like talcum powder! New version of Rich chocolate Royale taste more like milk chocolate and it's no longer gluten free! The new version actually separated from the milk after blending and placing in fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Wani

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor great mix base
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help with weight loss and portion control. I honestly got it to make shakes with and so far it has been amazing. I have been mixing it with frozen mixed berries and milk and it tastes like a dessert and makes me feel like I am spoiling myself. I am going to be trying to mix it with a super greens mix soon as well for a bigger health boost.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bellone

customer_reviews.title: Slimfast - better than any other diet plan!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, arrived early, and was well packaged. So much cheaper than other leading diet plans like Isagenix which is way over priced.Highly recommend, already down several pounds.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Great Taste, Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for two and a half weeks now and have lost 7 pounds. No exercising. I have stuck to the meal plan of two shakes a day and one small meal. Occasionally I also have a healthy protein bar throughout the day. I use 2% milk with my shakes and I think the flavor is GREAT! Not chalky or clumpy. I was so skeptical but I feel so much better and feel like it’s reteaching me how to eat and portion size. Such a great value and product!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: ... drinking the vanilla at first cuz I do not like chocolate anything and the Walmart only had chocolate or ...
customer_reviews.text: I was drinking the vanilla at first cuz I do not like chocolate anything and the Walmart only had chocolate or vanilla and the taste was okay but not the best but then I started ordering strawberry from here on amazon and loved it! Makes me feel full and I will now start drinking it to replace a meal once to twice a day to help with my weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Must have changed the recipie within last 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I Love Slim Fast Chocolate Royal...I have been purchasing this flavor for years...They must have just changed the recipie within the last 2 months...because it used to be a more grainy consistency that mixed really easily...now it is more of a powder consitency which I am not a fan of.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and was excited to try it after reading all of the reviews. I will be replacing breakfast and dinner with these shakes and I was curious if it had a chalky taste or not. To my surprise this tastes great!!! I used almond milk and ice and blended it with my nutribullet. It almost reminds me of a frosty from wendy’s, lol. I also bought vanilla, but I don’t like it as much as the chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Desroxx

customer_reviews.title: No protection seal. Did I get a used one?!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this before and love it. It taste amazing. Some days it fills me up but usually I get hungry for a snack early. I gave a poor review because the silver flavor/protection seal was not on the can I just received. Which makes me think something is wrong with it and not edible or used. Im so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rescue1untilThereRnone

customer_reviews.title: So delicious and great cost . So glad to be back with the original flavors.
customer_reviews.text: .. not sure why the manufacturers change the original slim fast ! The original is an exclusive product and others are not likely to catch up with it 😆... you can slim down successful with a sensible meal but the ingredients will discourage overrating . You just need to train yourself not to over do it because it’s delicious and you WILL find yourself drinking to much .. for one thing sugar is likely an enhancement to this product and it taste exactly like a shake. So if customers buy this weight delicious reducing product.. they will need to be careful not to over indulge.. otherwise it may be counterproductive with a weight loss program .
customer_reviews.author: Pf

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I’ve now tried the strawberry and the French vanilla. The strawberry is exactly as I imagined it to taste and it’s great! I love strawberries but I’m very picky with strawberry flavoring. I wouldn’t say that this holds me over and keeps me feeling full until lunch but it’s nice to start of my day with something light that allows me to take my medications and vitamins in the morning. I mix mine with almond milk because I hate the taste and smell of cow’s milk and I think it blends well with vanilla almond milk
customer_reviews.author: Paige Kaufmann

customer_reviews.title: Helps to calm cravings
customer_reviews.text: I have been binge eating lately, so I decided to try Slim Fast. It helps take away the cravings so I don't eat as much. The product was cheaper with the powder and I just go buy lactose-free milk at the store, because I am not much of a milk person. After about two months now I have kept on reordering because of the results noticed by family members. I exercise, take this product, and eat healthy meals and snacks. Taking this product alone without what I just described probably won't help you.
customer_reviews.author: Green Thumb

customer_reviews.title: Super HAPPY with my purchase...
customer_reviews.text: I've been having a hard time finding the "powder" formula, for awhile now. I don't have a big appetite, so I like using this as a meal supplement. Plus, it seems to give me an appetite after a couple of hours of drinking it too, so that's good. I like the "French Vanilla" flavor, because I add fresh strawberries, bananas, and flaxseed. It arrived on time, even with what is going on in our world... Super HAPPY with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Marshall

customer_reviews.title: It Works !
customer_reviews.text: It took a good solid few days for me to recognize let alone feel a difference throughout my day. I love this stuff. Its kept my appetite down surprisingly well. I'm not eating when i THINK I'm hungry. Depending on my work schedule and what I do through out the day it actually suppresses my appetite for over 4 hours. So far, I've lost nearly 10lbs. I really like the way I feel throughout the day. Will definitely re order this once I tun out
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: If you love chocolate milk, you will probably like this. I don't like chocolate milk, so I don't know why I thought I'd love this. The flavor is okay...nothing to rave about. But overall, it's just not impressive. Little protein, lots of sugar, bland flavor. It's also quite a heavy powder and when you get to the end of the glass, it all settles and becomes thick...unappetizing! However, it is cheap and it taste like chocolate milk. If those are the most important for you, this will be an okay choice.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: This product only has 2g protein as compared to the advertised 10g!!
customer_reviews.text: It advertises 10g protein If you look on the Nutritional Facts it’s only 2g protein and only 10g if you mix it with non fat milk! False advertising. What if you mix it with water or something other than milk? They shouldn’t put that on the front of the can if that’s not accurate. I decided to go with Pure Protein powder that I found on amazon. Around the same price, 25g of protein and only 4g of sugar compared to the 11g with this product. Also around the same calories. Way better for your body.
customer_reviews.author: Zakira

customer_reviews.title: yummy and best deal around
customer_reviews.text: I love this flavor and this is an amazing price for the amount! At Wal-mart it is much more expensive for the same amount of servings as this product. I do wish that the other flavors were as cheap as the chocolate, just for variety, but I honestly don't mind just using the chocolate. I ordered some vanilla for my husband to have some variety, but I just stick to the chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: ldb

customer_reviews.title: Not the right product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking the picture and description was accurate. What I received was one can of smoothie mix. You can get 2 cans of smoothie mix from other sellers for about the same price. There is no return from this seller so I am stuck with an overpriced product that I don't care for.
customer_reviews.author: linda spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is meh, but works great.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product and helped me drop the final five pounds that I've been wanting to, Only problem is, the taste leaves much to be desired. It would be best to use a blender of some sort because it never fully mixes in with the milk/water. If you don't have a blender, I suggest heating it up first, then putting in the powdered mix so that it dissolves properly, before leaving it in the fridge to cool.
customer_reviews.author: Maxgigify

customer_reviews.title: WAY too may carbs!
customer_reviews.text: I accidently bought this. I thought it would be good for my low carb diet. but there is so much sugar, its ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Covelli

customer_reviews.title: Nasty Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of slim fast but whatever flavor they changed this too is just disgusting. I used to like the packets of vanilla and wanted to try getting the same stuff in the canister. Turns out this isn't even close to the same in flavor and nothing I mix it with hides the flavor. I will not be buying this again. Try strawberry or banana instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dunn

customer_reviews.title: A bit sugary for my taste
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product last week (7/29/20) to get rid of the quarantine weight and now I'm not so sure. I rated three stars because of the flavor. I guess, maybe I'm not a big fan of strawberry and plus it's loaded with sugar. I thought I would like it by mixing it with other ingredients such as yogurt and fruits, still couldn't stomach the taste. I will try another flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: If you stick to the plan you will lose the ...
customer_reviews.text: If you stick to the plan you will lose the weight. Just make sure your snacks arent only their little snacks. These shakes are really delicious. I added 1% milk and did 16 oz instead of 8 oz to fill me up more. My snacks were mainly fruits and veggies. Those will FILL YOU UP
customer_reviews.author: Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Fresh vanilla flavor & aroma (obviously I'm reviewing the Vanilla & not the Chocolate!)
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor, which doesn't have the metallic taste that many vanilla-flavored products have. It mixes quickly & smoothly with various kinds of milk (regular, lactose-free, almond, coconut) in the blender, & retains its fresh flavor, which is enhanced by the addition of a banana.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Drab aka Tassy Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting MRS
customer_reviews.text: When I told my friend that I was giving SlimFast a second go she told me the 90’s called and they want their drink back. All jokes aside, this makes a delicious meal replacement shake. I’ve used different brands in the past, like Vega and Shakeology, but man, they taste awful. I mix this with four ice cubes and Elmhurst Sweetened Almond Milk and it’s just such a tasty treat and only 260 calories. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a solid MRS. Love the rich chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Just dont buy it look for something else.
customer_reviews.text: I hate doing reviews but you guys need it. DONT BUY THIS your going to keep scrolling like i do to find good reviews to convince yourself but lol its so nasty doesnt get you full. I love slim fast but i only like the caramel shake not this. The powder doesnt taste anything like the shake and i mixed it with sweetened almond milk but its so nasty like so nasty. I usually like everything but drinking this is like drinking apply cider vinegar it doesnt taste edible its good for you but damb its nasty.
customer_reviews.author: JOCELYN MUNGUIA

customer_reviews.title: This stuff hurt my stomach so bad.
customer_reviews.text: I just opened this today after receiving it yesterday. And let me tell you. 2 hours later & I am stilll laying in bed because my stomach hurts so bad. Is there anyway to get my money back for this?
customer_reviews.author: Debs

customer_reviews.title: Slimfast
customer_reviews.text: I just started using it on Jan 2nd and I honestly thought I would be more hungry throughout the day but I adjusted rather quickly to the plan. The only complaint I have is the flavor is rather strong and if you mix it according to directions its kinda thick so i add a little more milk. Overall I'm very happy and have already lost a few Lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: SUGAR takes one star... otherwise it would be 5!!
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't for the sugar that this contains it would for sure receive 5 stars if not 10. I started using it 4 days ago, on the 14th of April. I have no scale but I have a mirror, so I could do an update if I see results. The taste is just DELICIOUS. Believe me, is like being able to have a milkshake twice a day. Also, I have done my Amazon research and this is by far the cheapest meal replacement in relation to value. I'm not sure whether this is doing the job on its own because I'm also using Burn XT and a Caralluma Fimbriata supplement for appetite control between breakfast and dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: So grainy it was disgusting. No matter how much you blend it’s like drinking coffee grounds. I like the strawberry a lot. Also, I’ve bought vanilla and just add unsweetened coco powder and ended up just throwing this away
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is too sweet.
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Chocolate flavor from Slim Fast and was very satisfied, so I decided to give the strawberry flavor a try. It’s very good except for the fact that it tastes soooo sweet! I thought the flavor was going to be a little more soury like the real strawberries, but it’s way too sweet.
customer_reviews.author: EVTMM

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: The secret to this slim fast product is to get a tiny blender, I have two that are battery operated with a little paddle on the end which can mix my drink and get washed off after every meal. No big fuss just a well mixed drink that taste just like a premium chocolate milk shake.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Foley

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good but came without scoop
customer_reviews.text: The taste is good and it has directions on how to make as a drink or as a shake. The only downside is it says to use the scoop inside the container and one scoop is all I need.... there was no scoop included and I have no idea what measurement it is supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Paige C.

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money!
customer_reviews.text: I’m on a mostly liquid regime permanently due to oral surgery. I depended on ensure, boost, and other liquid supplements for my caloric intake. I came upon this product a couple of years ago, and it has as much nutritional value as those other brands, and keeps my diet balanced. Aside from the high quality of this product, the subscribe and save option for this item on amazon has saved me heaps money-wise, as it enables me to afford this product in bulk on a monthly basis. I’m so thankful for this slimfast powder and for this particular size, and it’s definitely affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Stechitong

customer_reviews.title: No weight loss!
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Didn't lose any weight while drinking it, but it does work for those mornings when you can't find time to whip up a nutritious breakfast. Won't be purchasing again though! Congratulations to everyone who DID lose weight though 😉
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFangirl

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of cravings
customer_reviews.text: I have a sugar addiction and during "binge mode" it's really difficult for me to manage cravings and portion control. This STOPS the cravings almost instantly! I don't follow Slimfast's recommended diet (since it doesn't seems suitable long term) but I am very thankful for these shakes for helping me. Now I'm on a Ketogenic diet and have lost 30lbs so far. I highly recommend this product to anyone that needs help transitioning from an uncontrolled diet to a more structured meal plan.
customer_reviews.author: Arcane

customer_reviews.title: Good taste.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced dinner with one serving. Lost about 7 lbs first two weeks. Then got stuck again. Added lots of ice and mixed in blended. Good taste.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money, tastes delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Made my first shake today and it was delicious! I went to the slimfast official website to see if it can be mixed with water instead of milk because I'm trying to cut down on carbs. I bought this instead of the keto version because it was a much better value for your money. The slimfast official site said it could be made with water as a substitute for milk so I made it with 8 ounces of water, 1 scoop powder mix and it was fantastic! Will buy again when I start to run low!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Can't get what you order
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Milk Chocolate Original powder .which is delicious. I once lost over 40 pounds with that stuff. They came out with another flavor Chocolate Royale which is not near as good and I do not like it. I was going to try this again. I ordered Milk Chocolate, and was sent Chocolate Royale. I sent it back and reordered Milk Chocolate and again was sent Chocolate Royale. If I could get the original Milk Chocolate, I would definitely buy again and give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Denise McPheron

customer_reviews.title: Delicious french vanilla flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is economical as well as tasty. Vanilla is my favorite flavor and french vanilla is my favorite vanilla. Slimfast has the french vanilla flavor down. It is especially good if you throw a few ice cubes in the blender to make it thicker. I have tried the more expensive, higher protein Slimfast vanilla and I still like this one much better.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Filling and flavorful
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, and as someone who LOVES eating, I can say it really does fill you up. (Not as much as a pizza, but it will satiate your hunger physically.) I'll have one of these instead of breakfast/dinner. As with any protein shake or protein bar, you do have to get used to the "chocolate" taste as it isn't exactly like chocolate milk, but it's not difficult, and I still think it tastes pretty good! No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe A.

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is good, too much sugar added.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for about two months and I was trying to lose weight. I noticed that I lost about 10 lbs. but I look at the ingredients and there is a lot of added sugars. The flavor is pretty good ( I used almond milk or water ) . I stop using it because of the added sugars. You can definitely lose some weight but it won't be much.
customer_reviews.author: Kary

customer_reviews.title: Great quantity
customer_reviews.text: It's a great quantity for the price. However, personally the powdered shakes aren't my cup of tea. It is exactly what it is: powder. The taste after blending it several times was powdery. Maybe warming the milk up and blending the shakes then refrigerating it might help to get rid of the powdery taste for those who don't like the chalky taste. I think I rather stick to the premade shakes, or Carnations Breakfast Essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Im Chan

customer_reviews.title: I never get tired of this drink...
customer_reviews.text: I never get tired of this drink, and I love that I can lose weight or maintain with it, I have gotten rid of 32lbs. so far. I love it...
customer_reviews.author: Roanne Vef

customer_reviews.title: Yuck - try the chocolate flavor instead
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t even give it more than 1 star due to the flavor. It smelled like Nesquik strawberry powder so I was excited to try it. I blended it with my milk and all I could taste was chalk. It was thick and the flavor was overwhelmingly nasty.
customer_reviews.author: J Pell

customer_reviews.title: Order more than one flavor
customer_reviews.text: Tastes pretty good i do wish it was a bigger can. This one only has 14 servings. I do recommend getting one of those shaker bottles for it. (If you mix with a spoon not all the powder gets mixed in) kind of tastes like melted french vanilla ice cream. The strawberry tastes very very grainy.
customer_reviews.author: avery

customer_reviews.title: Happy to drink
customer_reviews.text: Yes please!! No funny business here. Bought the mix to try the slimfast diet. No joke this mix is DELISHIOUS. I mix with 1% milk and it tasted no different than 2%. Its rich and creamy and keeps me full until lunch time, seriously. I'd highly recommend if you're looking for a mix that you actually want to drink more of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tase and helps with hunger control & cravings!
customer_reviews.text: Just started today and already drank two shakes, one for breakfast with a few ice cubes, 1 banana, 8 oz skim milk and one full scoop of powder & for lunch just 1 scoop of powder, a few ice cubes and 8 oz of skim milk.. along with lunch shake I used my portion containers for some carrots and hummus! So far I definitely think it helps with hunger control/craving the wrong types of food.. I am also following a diet and do piyo 6 days a week! Will update in a few weeks with results!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps You Full and Great Taste!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shake as it keeps me full and the taste is great. The only thing I thought was weird was that one of the first ingredients was sugar and with the popularity of keto diets this may not be the best choice. If you are watching calories though it’s great. I’ve been drinking the Slinfast shakes and following the diet l for about two weeks now and have lost about 6 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and Works!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, wasn't hungry either. I put a scoop (which I thankfully already had, since the container didn't contain one) into fruit and almond milk smoothies in the mornings for breakfast. Using it only once a day (it's recommended twice a day) it lasted over a month and I lost 4 stubborn pounds! I will definitely be getting more and actually adhering to the directions (maybe with a more dramatic result)!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor! Tastes like chocolate milk. Sometimes I’ll add a banana and some ice to make a milkshake. The directions say you can mix with a spoon I believe, but I would definitely recommend mixing in a blender, otherwise you’ll have a ton of powdery chunks. It doesn’t control my hunger that awfully much, but they do recommend snacks in between meals so it makes sense. Definitely satisfies my craving for sweet things!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opened box, almost broken seal.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, usually when I first purchased Slim Fast, both the box and the seal was intact. But, now the box looked like someone was trying to open it. Also, the seal looked like it was about to burst. Yes, I did open the seal (it looked like it was about to pop, so I had to), so I'm not really sure what to do to it now. To be completely honest, I'm not really sure why this happened or what I did wrong to cause this.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good with milk, filling
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it in place of a snack and have actually lost some weight over the past couple weeks. It seems that the Chinese and Japanese translation of "sheerness" is "purity" or "authenticiy", so I gave it 5 stars for sheerness since it does not appear to be a knockoff. If anybody figures out what the sheerness rating refers to, please post it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Jones

customer_reviews.title: If your were wondering about taste..
customer_reviews.text: Can was a little smaller then expected .... And i noticed it only has 10 grams protien per serving and the can i bought else wear has 20grams.. No big deal... The flavor is great.. Its like a thick strawberry milk.. Doesnt taste like vitamins or anything and doesnt have an aftertaste ... I mix mine with coconut milk i found on amazon .. Worth 5 stars .. Good price too
customer_reviews.author: Rrenasb

customer_reviews.title: Tip for those doing Weight Watchers (WW) Freestyle
customer_reviews.text: Take a scoop of this (2 points) and mix it with 1 cup or 2 of Greek Yogurt (0 points), and you have a creamy, chocolately treat. You could probably freeze it as well to make a frozen yogurt. YUM!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mix. I've tried other protein rich meal-replacements, and this flavor is the best I've ever had. I mix with vanilla flavored almond milk in a Blender bottle. Great start to the day, especially because I'm not much of a breakfast person. Great to grab and go. It tastes better if you drink it right after you mix it. Highly recommend this as a meal alternative! Tastes amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea in Arkansas

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: It tasted great, however it does not suppress my hunger for 4 hours like it’s supposed to. I would say I’m only satisfied for 2 and a half hours, but I guess you’re supposed to eat a snack between the two “meals”.
customer_reviews.author: Sodapop

product_meta.title: SlimFast Original Rich Chocolate Royale Meal Replacement Shake Mix – Weight Loss Powder – 31.18 Oz Canister – 34 Servings
product_meta.description: Flavor:Rich Chocolate Royale| Size:1.94 Pound (Pack of 1)Losing weight is as easy as 1 – 2 – 3 when you activate the SlimFast Plan. One of the essential elements of this clinically proven weight loss program is replacing two daily meals with the great-tasting SlimFast Original Meal Replacement Shake Mix Powder. This meal replacement product that put SlimFast on the map is a great-tasting product that curbs hunger cravings for up to four hours. It contains 200 calories in each 8-fluid ounce serving, giving you plenty of energy to keep your body alert during the day. It is also packed with vitamins, protein, essential minerals, and fiber. This meal replacement shake mix by SlimFast contains 10 grams of protein along with 4 grams of fiber and 24 essential vitamins and minerals that help your body process and burn stored fat, making it easier for you to lose weight.
feature_bullets: Great taste: Chocolate royale flavor, slimfast original meal replacement shake mix powders are a delicious way to lose weight
Packed with protein, vitamins, & minerals: The SlimFast Original meal replacement Shake Mix Powder is a balanced formula packed with 24 essential vitamins and minerals
Curbs hunger: SlimFast Original Powder Mix are an exceptional meal replacement product that curbs hunger for up to four hours to keep you satisfied
Digestive support: SlimFast original powders contain 4 grams of fiber to help promote better digestion and are gluten free.
Part of the slimfast plan: The SlimFast Plan offers flexibility and simplicity to make losing weight as easy as 1 – 2 – 3

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
